name: The Write to Publish
description:
Made for the University of Portsmouth 2019 game jam!

Fish for pages to complete your perfect book. Avoid debris lest they taint your perfect ideas. Choose a book to complete at the start of a level. Bigger books provide better benefits for future levels but are harder to complete.

Credits

Finn Truman- Programming

James Kelly - Sound engineering

George Smith - 3D Modelling

Annie Bennet - 2D art
